kbn_knj1 = #{kbnKnj1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kbn_knj2 = #{kbnKnj2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where bunrui_cod = #{bunruiCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and kbn1 = #{kbn1,jdbcType=CHAR} and kbn2 = #{kbn2,jdbcType=CHAR} and tekiyostr_ymd = #{tekiyostrYmd,jdbcType=DATE}
